short_summary: Supply 4 air mobility containers and accessories
description: PWGSC, on behalf of the department of National Defence (DND) Valcartier and Calgary, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of four air mobility containers and accessories, including the delivery.
full_summary:
**Tender Title** Air mobility containers *English version:* Taxation ID TC SCN:**WS4507639188** Amendment number: **1** Solicitation number:** WS4507639188 *French version:* Titre appels offre: Conteneurs de mobilité aérienne * ID fiscal SCN**:** WC4507639188 Numéro de modification:** 1 Numéro de sollicitation**:** WS4507639188

Public release date:** June 10, 2024
Close of Tenders:** July 15, 2024 - 2:00 PM Local Time The PSPC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence(DND) Valcartier and Calgary , invites you to submit a proposal for the acquisition of air mobility containers and their accessories including the delivery, as per Annexed Request for Requirement Declaration of the Requirements. This is a Request Period is Request for Proposal(RFP). *Objective Statement Individual Proposals are invited for one-year air mobility container supplies, respectively. **Delivery Requirements** Deliver containers directly within the delivery regions: – **Region** : Québec **Trade Agreements** This procurement is governed by the trade agreements below: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement. Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement. Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement. Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA). Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA). Contractor must be qualified under the trade agreements before bidding. **Selection Criteria: ** Most Responsive Proposal evaluated by lowest price. Successful Supplier must have at least a 30% Express Category. Evaluation documents are available on [insert URL]. **Point of Contact: ** Annie Deslauriers Ministry of Public Services and Government (TPSGC). [insert contact email] **Additional Details:** Attached files include a full Request for Proposal document in English.

Areas to be addressed to include **Appendix A to N** please to view - non official binder via link Note : ID tax labels have been renumbered for formatting purposes. With great collaborative efforts, all contributors looked forward to more actionable vision and presentation layout revises for Accuracy experts. THE ENTIRE SOURCe AND TEtimation OF SAMWAYS COMMIDES Note: Please view parameters and the assessment clarification approach during calling
